de.hu.gralog.structure
Interface GraphFactory<G extends ListenableGraph>

Type Parameters:
G - the graphType
public interface GraphFactory<G extends ListenableGraph>

This interface defines a Factory for JGraphT-Graphs that can be associated to GrALoG-Structures via StructureTypeInfo.getGraphFactory() in order to store the mathematical graph-structure underlying your GrALoG-Structure.

Note that you can use any JGraphT-Graph as long as you wrapp this graph in a ListenableGraph, which can be either a ListenableDirectedGraph or a ListenableUndirectedGraph.

Plugin-Developers

Here is an example implementing a GraphFactory that returns a DirectedMultiGraph - that is wrapped in a ListenableDirectedGraph, i.e. a directed graph that is allowed to have multiple edges and loops: 
                public class DirectedMultiGraphGraphFactory 
                                implements GraphFactory<ListenableDirectedGraph<LabeledStructureVertex, DefaultEdge> {
                        public ListenableDirectedGraph<LabeledStructureVertex, DefaultEdge> createGraph() {
                                return new ListenableDirectedGraph<LabeledStructureVertex,DefaultEdge>( new DirectedMultiGraph<LabeledStructureVertex, DefaultEgde>( DefaultEdge.class ) );
                        }
                }
Please refer to de.hu.gralog.structure.types for further examples and to JGraphT for information on JGraphT.

Author:
Sebastian
